artist: Artist: Unknown; Artist: After Charles-Émile Jacque (?)
catalogue_raissonne: appears to be copy after Guiffrey 218
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: man seated in profile at a table, resting his head on his hand at R; man at L leaning over bench across from table talking to seated man, holding a pitcher; other figures at R
inscription:
Inscription

-- lettered in plate, lower left: [Ch. Jacque]
-- in graphite on recto at lower left: No. 218
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Drinkers at a Table with Embracing Couples
